title: The Venerable Swordsman - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Aristocracy   Body Tempering   Caring Protagonist   Cultivation   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   Sudden Strength Gain   Sword Wielder   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong   Younger Sisters
author: Qing Luan Feng Shang   青鸾峰上
description: As the heir apparent of the Ye family, Ye Xuan went through fire and water for his family, but Ye Lang, who had just awakened his Divine Soul, usurped his place. In order to keep his position, Ye Xuan challenged Ye Lang to a Life-death Duel. With the broken Dantian, would he win this fight? The black ring his mother left brought him a great opportunity: Realm Hell Tower, where he met a mysterious lady, who told him to look for nine Daoist Laws to enhance his strength and gave him the Spirit Heaven Sword. Could Ye Xuan find all the Daoist Laws and become a powerful swordsman?>
